    • Constructor Detail

      • VersionIdentifierFormatterPhaseNumber

        public VersionIdentifierFormatterPhaseNumber(StringUtil stringUtil,
                                             String prefix,
                                             int phaseNumberPadding)
        The constructor.
        Parameters:
        stringUtil - is the StringUtil instance.
        prefix - is the static prefix to append before the phase number. Will be omitted if phase number is null.
        phaseNumberPadding - is the padding (minimum number of digits) for the phase number. The default is 0.
